name: Timmie
title: "Pure Patience" Timmie
desc: "Will pigeons that have flown away come back?"

attributes.source: Reward for accepting Timmie's Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Triggers automatically once per Round: This card gains 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Pigeon. When this card gains 3 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Pigeons, discard this card, then draw 1 card and create <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Omni Element Ã—1.
